lenders.name: Bananabrianna and Monkey

lenders.occupational_info: I am a classroom high school math teacher. I love being in a classroom with young adults learning how to be successful people!

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves  an opportunity to get ahead.

lenders.name: Ofisa Nyaikondo
lenders.loan_because: The best way to better the world is to give tools to others. By doing so, we make a difference, one family at a time.
lenders.occupational_info:
Lifetime responsible learner, professional, organizer, activist, advocate, planner, listener, volunteer, and global servant. The global war on poverty and advancement of opportunities begins by spurring hope. By advancing the spirit of giving, I can contribute and participate in mobilizing the human capital that will see us building a strong, vibrant community.
I plan to make it a lifelong pursuit.

lenders.name: Anjum
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves. I joined after Kiva was introduced to me in Church.

lenders.name: Janice & Ken
lenders.loan_because: my husband and I received seed funding for his company and it has meant a great deal to us.
lenders.occupational_info: We are fundraisers focused on people leaving a bequest in one's will to a charity they love and support (you can't take it with you!).  I officiate weddings, funerals and other types of ritual ceremonies, along with being a bereavement counselor.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I might not be able to help everyone in the world, but helping one person at a time is how change begins.

lenders.name: Fabrizio
lenders.loan_because: I like to help

lenders.name: Bruce & Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I think its a fantastic way to help people, it is the small businesses that do the most for everyone.

lenders.name: Paul & Kristi
lenders.loan_because:
If a brother or sister is poorly clothed and lacking in daily food, and one of you says to them, "Go in peace, be warmed and filled," without giving them the things needed for the body, what good is that? James 2:15-16

Better is a poor man who walks in his integrity than a rich man who is crooked in his ways.  Proverbs 28:6

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: As a fellow entrepreneur, I am very interested in helping people who want to create or improve their own circumstances. It's rewarding to be able to lend a hand to people in all regions of the world, and I'm especially touched that I can help people in Eastern Europe where all of my grandparents were born.
lenders.occupational_info: I do writing and graphic design for marketing and communication pieces, mainly for bank clients.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make sure people and companies treat our precious natural resources with respect.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to give back and help other people out if you can.  I think Kiva is a phenomenal concept and they are doing a great job, while allowing people to improve their standard of living!

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate to live in Canada and enjoy a good life. This is a chance to help others enjoy a good life.

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.loan_because: I am aware of my blessings and want to contribute something to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who are depressed, anxious or who are having problems in relationships.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone who deserves it

lenders.occupational_info: I study traveling and turism, in Norway, and would like to start my own business some day. I just don't know what kind of business yet. =)

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I am a business student and I love the idea of microfinance. I want to share the success that I have enjoyed, however much or however little with those that need it around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I am going into my last year of an International Business Administration degree at York University in Toronto. I have had the luck of working in financial services, consumer packaged goods and energy management and I look forward to the rest of my education and my future career!

lenders.name: Eric and Sue
lenders.loan_because: We wish to make a contribution to global society but want to have some measure of control of where our contribution goes.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an IT Support Team.

lenders.name: Geoffrey
lenders.loan_because: I'm fascinated with the ability to change the world one person at a time.

lenders.name: Joe

lenders.occupational_info: I help people get things done faster and cheaper.

lenders.name: Linn
lenders.loan_because: I received a gift certificate.  I had not heard of Kiva and found this effort very worth while.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who have been traumatized.

lenders.name: Peter & Felice
lenders.loan_because: Our hearts tell us to.

lenders.name: Lucius
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to have a better life one step at a time and I feel that people deserve a better life, education and living standards.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a lemonade stand every summer at a crafts fair, using real lemons.  I use  my profits to help people starting their businesses.

lenders.name: Ellie
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who need money and have good ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going into second grade.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I think it's both interesting and important.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a major U.S. non-profit. The non-profit is a leading provider of research grants and public health information.

lenders.name: ADC
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is at the root of so many problems. When poverty is addressed and eradicated, our world will become a joyful place for everyone.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I think this kind of loan can make a real difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people to find a job they love.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible for a little to go a long way.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Less fortunate, hard workers need a chance.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: Too often we are too consumed with our own need to be smarter, prettier, thinner, wealthier, when others around the world are can't find the means to meet the basic needs of humanity. It's so easy to make a difference to someone else who needs a little support.

lenders.name: John H
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the individual, their right  to progress, self-determination and hope.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: .. a little bit at the right place, at the right time makes a difference.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help people get ahead. I have so much, and I give to help others.

lenders.name: Jeffrey

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: It is my pleasure to help someone less fortunate than myself, help themselves.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: Just a little bit can change someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the arts.

lenders.name: Jared
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro solutions are the way to macro change.  Show generosity to one and they will pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare the design drawings and facilitate the municipal approval process to get residential, commercial, industrial and institutional structures built.

lenders.name: Lou
lenders.loan_because: It's easy and effective
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a company that makes computer software

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people hand up, not a hand out!

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small technology businesses plan and market themselves.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: "For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required"
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Ontario Provincial Government.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to see how the Kiva process works - and want to be part of a solution - no matter how small or large.
lenders.occupational_info: Making sure that our hospital lives the mission and values of our organization -- which is to reveal God's love for all - especially the poor and vulnerable.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: there are many others less fortunate than I am, and I want to do my part to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently attending university to further my education.

lenders.name: jason
lenders.loan_because: I like the Kiva concept, I work with individuals every day, and I like to see exactly who I am helping out.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving back, in grass-roots economic development, and the ability of one person to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle administative and financial matters for a private Pre-K through 12th grade school in the Dominican Republic

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: it's a personalized way to empower women and make a diference, however small.

lenders.name: Singleton
lenders.loan_because:
I care to try and give like Jesus commanded to give to the poor, this is not just giving but teaching them to fish like he taught his disciples to teach with FAITH when you fish(or entrepreneur) 
I wanted to remain anonymous but to network with other Kiva Lenders you must go public. I am wrestling with this idea, as I think it was said that when you give do not tell your left hand what your right hand is doing. So being public, makes this for me at least a struggle to remain pure at heart as a 'true giver' instead of just another entrepreneur. But, all of this said? It isn't about me or my 'feelings' but more about planting seeds that can grow. And to do this? I lend. Lending with Kiva plants seeds of Hope but also links the lender or tither so that they might witness the growth and learn exactly how their tithe works instead of just randomly dishing it out to an unknown corporation (non-profit) without ever having any control.
I have given to churches in the past where I questioned the legitimacy of the spending. Here you get to the root of the need. Keeping it very simple. I like Simple.
lenders.occupational_info:
I use a fairly simple mechanical and electronic device to capture images of the world.
In these images, it helps to remind people what God has created, and what we must do as human beings all of us children of God to help one another by giving. Only truly giving is living!

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a fantastic opportunity to help give a determined person a foot up!
lenders.occupational_info: I organise people so that they all work together to build computer systems for large businesses.

lenders.name: Philippe
lenders.loan_because: Having lived and traveled in Asia, I know how much people need help and how difficult it is to organize it in an efficient way. I hope that by supporting organizations like Kiva, the world will be a bit better. I also believe that if many people do small things, we can change the world.

lenders.name: Accelerators
lenders.loan_because: We are a passionate group of NAB people who want to help people who have had less opportunity than we have had.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing banking and finance solutions to NAB customers around the world.

lenders.name: Markus
lenders.loan_because: i highly value people making the effort of improving their lives.

lenders.name: Allen and Raine
lenders.loan_because: to create a beautiful garden, you must first plant some seeds.

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: I hope I can make a little difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Leanne
lenders.loan_because: I can - I have more than enough so I feel this is one way that I can support people to be in control of their own lives and I get to choose who I would like to help. I feel then I have a connection with people in other countries.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It is awesome that we get to help people around the world.

lenders.name: Candace
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate and it's the right thing to do.   It's great to see the entrepreneur's photo and watch as the amount of money being lent grows and gets to their goal.   It's a good way to feel like I am helping someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people feel better using Pilates exercises.   I help people who have been in car accidents, people who have spinal issues as well as the general population.     I teach them how to do Pilates exercises that will eliminate pain, make them stronger and help them feel better.

lenders.occupational_info: Jason currently works for an organization helping farmers develop environmentally sustainable practices, while Carol is currently in school to become a lawyer.

lenders.occupational_info: I assist with the running of an engineering and construction company.

lenders.occupational_info: typiing for companies, industries etc.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: It's a chance for others to realize their potential and improve their businesses, regardless of what scale they are at
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps clients understand their customers, and connect with them. We do this by combining creativity and technology in various ways.

lenders.occupational_info: I am engaged in external audit. I am interested in business that I have never imagined.

I am rich in many ways, have a warm, safe house, enough food and access to good education. Why not share what I can with some other women and give them a chance to improve their circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint (oils mostly) and make unique textile crafts which I sell at the Farmer's Market and at local stores.

lenders.loan_because: I believe completely in micro credit as a viable solution to global poverty.

lenders.loan_because: we are all connected and have a responsibility to do what we can for one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I create illustrations and write poems.  I paint things that are whimsical.  I create happy art.

lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I like the idea of helping other people who are trying to launch or run their own business, especially those in the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop concepts and write the words for marketing and communications pieces such as radio, television, video and print.

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because: I run a business myself and believe that investing directly in hard working people is the best way to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise companies on ways to operate more efficiently.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because:
1) It increases productivity in impoverished countries.
2) It benefits not only the recipient of the loan but their community as well.
3) Local food production is better for the environment.

lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.occupational_info: I want to help those that are less fortunate than I am.

lenders.loan_because: i

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to help people directly who need a hand to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Not working right now, but when I was, I was part of a team that created new foodservice products.

lenders.name: Dwayne
lenders.loan_because: Nice to see how a relatively small amount of money can make a difference to someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I create and promote websites to help people sell things on the internet. My main website is NorCalCars.com where I display used cars for sale by local dealers.

lenders.name: Luca
lenders.loan_because: For Helping unfortunately people with a little effort.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student and a Web Publisher, Developer, Webmaster and IT Consultant.

lenders.name: Shbiha
lenders.loan_because: A journey of thousand miles begins with a single step.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help one another  --  We are all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I cast  non-speaking roles in feature films. All the beautiful faces in the background of a scene -- this is what I cast. I write comedy and I love to laugh. Story is an amazing thing.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: It's great to support others who are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a federal government agency that protects various sections of ocean surrounding the United States.

lenders.name: Lucia & Fidelis
lenders.loan_because: of the joy and the power of our project seedgiveback to improve lives and human dignity
lenders.occupational_info: interested in stewardship, impact and investing in human dignity

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because:
I am an adoptive Mom to a  Guatemalan-born son.  I want to help the hard-working people in my son's country of birth.

When no available loan requests are available for my son's country of birth, I want to help families with children.

When I compare the value of the American dollar to it's equilivant in second and third world countries, I can see just how much of a difference a small loan is to these families.
lenders.occupational_info: Federal Government

lenders.name: Miles
lenders.loan_because: everything in the world is connected in some way. This program gives me a chance to provide aid to other people in the world whose causes and work I support. We often travel to other countries for enjoyment, and yet the people in those countries may never have that same opportunity. Loans are a good way to allow others to enjoy their lives a little more and produce something of value to their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: In addition to having a freelance graphic design practice, I work for a branding firm.  A 'brand' is someone's feeling about a particular company and what it offers, so 'branding' is a process of using strategy and design to improve a company's organization, function and appearance to the public. If a company is well branded, its audience will have the best possible collective feeling about it. Our firm strives to organize all aspects of a company by positioning them in the marketplace (giving them a sense of who they are and why they matter), creating new and improved messaging for them (how a company presents themselves in writing to their audiences), organizing all their products and services into a clear hierarchy that meshes with the overall brand ideals and the positioning, and designing identities for them (logos, supporting graphic systems, and all instances of logo/visual system placement on all types of products, services and marketing materials).

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: Because it makes me feel good to help others.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I like that, for a relatively small amount of money, I can be part of a worldwide community of lenders and entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I am active as a volunteer.  I tell stories to children and adults, serve as a director of a storytelling group and mentor a child in elementary school.

lenders.name: Gaye
lenders.loan_because: Being involved in helping others is most rewarding, and this organization certainly gets to the grassroots with their aid

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: We can all make a difference in others' lives.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: no one will believe in you if you don't believe in the others

lenders.name: Solange
lenders.loan_because: I have to if I can
lenders.occupational_info: As a fun thing to do

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: It is important for me that my limited resources are spent making tangible change in the lives of individuals, rather than being spent funding the organizational structure of large charities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Ph.D student in Political Science, with a focus on issues of global justice.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: It's wonderful to be able to provide person to person help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a software development consultant and project manager.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We're all bozos on this bus. Which is to say, we're all together on this planet and when we help one, we help many.

lenders.name: Mark

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the banking sector.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: it is a blessing to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: Mother, grandmother and secretary at a social worker´s office.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with small complicated electronic machines.

lenders.name: Nate
lenders.loan_because: Their are people in need
lenders.occupational_info: I help retirement plans manage their money, so that their employees have money when they retire.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a wonderful life and would like to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I help people in debt to resolve their financial problems.

lenders.name: Dan & Season
lenders.loan_because: my wife and I want to make other peoples goals attainable.
lenders.occupational_info: I research how to restore streams and rivers and my wife is a pediatric nurse.

lenders.name: Vickie
lenders.loan_because: Loaning strengthens the world. It helps others prosper, bringing better living conditions to the recipients and their families. It also helps build connections between people and societies, and that promotes understanding, empathy, harmony, and peace. It's all good.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and maintain school library resources and help students and teachers access and use those resources. This advances education, making the world a better place for all. I encourage reading and teach research and writing skills. I do my best to help students grow academically, socially, and emotionally. I want them all to become responsible, self-sufficient, well-informed, open-minded, curious, and caring world citizens.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because:
I work as an Architect and an entrepreneur, I set up companies and develop software systems to run them. I know that it can be challenging to make a business successful and can hardly imagine how hard it must be if there is no easy source of funding. 

I find it inspirational to help others around the world to achieve their ambitions and dreams. It empowers them and me. I easily get as much out of it as they do.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a several companies, One develops software to run businesses, another (in partnership with others) markets and sells lighting design into Architects and interior designers, another is a service provider, offering a sales team, operations and warehousing resources. I also work in the field of self development, helping people realise that their only limitations are their beliefs and that since they were adopted they can be changed. I do this as part of Avatarepc.com

lenders.name: michel & Angela
lenders.loan_because: I know how important it is to be able to access a loan when building a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a self employed photographer. I enjoy photography because of the people I meet, the places I see, the things I learn and experience, whether I am photographing a wedding in Kelowna British Columbia, making a business portrait in Vancouver, discussing a concept for an advertising photograph, or just chatting with a pilot on my way back from a shoot in Alberta.

lenders.name: P, H, M & S
lenders.loan_because: We got tired of hearing about Americans who can't pay off the mortgages on their expensive homes, so we decided this was our act of "civil disobedience" to our consumer culture.

lenders.name: Kandra
lenders.loan_because: I have the opportunity to help people empower themselves

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.occupation: Stay at home dad/part time software support

lenders.name: Giao-Anh
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my life beyond what I could earn or deserve.  It gives me joy to share His blessings with people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach fifth grade students in an elementary school.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to foster growth in individuals who have drive and ambition but are lacking in capital. I hope that my small contribution will make a positive difference in the lives of a family or community.

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.occupational_info: I get to work with children everyday! I get to see them change the world, grow into inspiring and critical thinking beans. I get to help children see a bright future, I get to assist children challenge, explore and seek the world they live in every single day. I couldn't ask for a better "job."

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: I work for a charity where people are in need and realize that everyone needs a helping hand sometimes
lenders.occupational_info: Having spent my career in sales, I am now using my sales and marketing skills to raise funds to help families who are facing challenges in their lives.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: I want to help individuals accomplish their goals.

lenders.name: Lucas
lenders.loan_because: This world is made into what it is today by entrepreneurs throughout human history, we should bless them with our courage, help in any way we can to make their dreams a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I am grateful for everything that I've got, and live each day as if it's my last.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: Formerly with IBM Canada, I am now retired.

lenders.name: Salma
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a small difference in the world. God put me on this earth for a few reasons and this is one of them!
lenders.occupational_info: I give smiles back to people who have lost theirs.

lenders.name: Izzy
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a good reason not to!

lenders.name: Michael

lenders.name: Caleb

lenders.name: Tim

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: of the human spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping humans use technology with ease and comfort.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: People help people.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I like Kiva because it  helps to restore fairness, dignity, and the opportunity to work and maintain community wellness to all peoples in all nations. What a wonderful idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I support my clients in reducing stress or worry in their lives and resolve problems within their families. I often help men who have problems with anger and violence to learn how to let go of what they have learned, replacing it with self-love and responsibility to others.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: We should!
lenders.occupational_info: Fly people through the sky in pressurized aluminum tubes.

lenders.name: Brittney
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an amazing way to reach out to people who are doing everything they can to improve the lives of their families. One day I want to be able to volunteer in the places that I donate to...but for now I want to make an impact in every way I can!

lenders.name: David Abdo
lenders.loan_because: I want someone to have the opportunity to realize one of their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce and distribute music to people all over the world.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: any reason I could give would pale to compare to the possibility of a better life for someone, anyone, anywhere.
lenders.occupational_info: I teacher kids. It's like teaching kids, but more funny sounding.

lenders.name: Yuliana and my dog, Bola
lenders.occupational_info:
Yuliana - nothing too exciting to share
Bola - my job is very tough, I have to play all day, hide my squeaky toys to every corner, and chase my glorious tail which is very difficult to catch.

lenders.name: Mauro e Luisa
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make the internet.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: N/A

lenders.name: Rolan Napitupulu
lenders.loan_because: together we can make a difference...

lenders.name: Hanno
lenders.loan_because: Paying tribute to entrepreneurship and the pursuit of better living conditions is good, supporting it is better.

lenders.name: Mika
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to see industrious people prosper despite their original powerty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a CEO and entrepreneur in several small companies.

lenders.name: Liliane Emma Lesley
lenders.loan_because:
We want to be kind to people. (Emma - on the left)
We want to help people around the world. (Lesley - on the right)
We are inspired by people who act on their dreams,  we love learning about others around the world and we recognize that, by comparison with others, we have so much, so it's good to share. (Liliane, writer & mum)
- ELL Banco!
lenders.occupational_info:
We (Emma and Lesley) are 13 year old home educating twins who love gymnastics!
I (Liliane) am a writer and speaker. My book, The Mastery Club - See the Invisible, Hear the Silent, Do the Impossible, is about young people who take responsibility for achieving their goals and making their dreams come true!

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: Small things can make huge differences in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people & businesses crash proof their financial future.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I can and I believe in sustainable help.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student. I will soon study International Relations and hope to work in different locations across the globe.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I want to help  people break out of poverty. I believe the best thing you can do is to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large software vendor managing software development projects.

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because: I believe we need to think globally in terms of economy and help everyone succeed in their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a world filled with beauty and do everything I can to share that.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I give what I can
lenders.occupational_info: none

lenders.name: Yolande Ankersmit
lenders.loan_because: I am a quilter, piecing little bits of material together. The work of KIVA seems similar, making a big difference by many little bits of money!
lenders.occupational_info: At the moment I am a counselor helping people to get a focus on their lives. I have been a career counselor for almost 20 years. And I run a guestroom in our beautifull former coffeewarehouse. My guests love the historical city of Deventer.

lenders.name: Marian & Randy
lenders.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in my life and I would like to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a manufacturing business with my husband.

lenders.name: THE DQ CLAN
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people who want to succeed!!

lenders.name: Juris Gallardo
lenders.loan_because: as a working student, its the best i can do to help improve one's life.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good inside.
lenders.occupational_info: Anything smaller than a nanometer.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to help those who help themselves.  I am very thankful for the life I have and being able to share with others makes me a happier person.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: The truth is: because I feel guilty. I have so much by comparison. Also, I trust the process and believe my small contributions reach the people in need. Thank you KIVA workers!

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: Whenever we went travelling, people shared their lifes and homes with us. With this loan we hope to send this good vibe further around. We also hope to make someones day!
lenders.occupational_info: climbing...yoga...love...laugh....travel...

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: II Corinthians 8:13 -15
lenders.occupational_info: Charitable and business proposal development.

lenders.name: Bintou
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: mansoor
lenders.occupation: Direct marketing coordinator for a NGO
lenders.loan_because: It's my Islamic duty, to help everyone who is in need
lenders.occupational_info: Fellow human being sharing this planet with everyone else.  Adam was created from dirt obtained from different parts of the earth to represent our uniqueness, and we shall return back to dirt.

lenders.name: Joey
lenders.loan_because: i like to know im helping out people around the world

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: Maybe it will make a small difference --- $25 at a time.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital taking care of sick people.

lenders.name: Ovett
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to help make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and I am employed in leadership programs at the University of Arizona.

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it's our duty to help and encourage people in need to be self-sufficient!
lenders.occupational_info: My work is liberating and free to express my point of view!

lenders.name: Soma
lenders.loan_because: this is a good way to contribute to the community and getting to know whats happening around the world
lenders.occupational_info: i am a homemaker and a mother of a toddler. (i guess that doesnt need much of an explanation!)

lenders.name: Mary Beth
lenders.loan_because: because we live on this great big blue marble together, and anybody who knows me will tell you I am a giver.
lenders.occupational_info: As a nurse I help heal, teach, care and love my patients.

lenders.name: Veronica & Niki
lenders.loan_because: I realize hard work and determination are not the only tools you need to succeed in life.

lenders.name: Dilnaaz
lenders.loan_because: It's one small way of doing something for the betterment of those who need a helping hand to become self sufficient.

lenders.name: Antonio & Alexia
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in other people's lives. There is nothing greater than reaching out  to help those in need. If we can make one child smile everyday by our actions... we in turn will be happy.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people buy and sell houses. And we dance for the fun of it. Our hobby is ballroom dancing.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a chance

lenders.name: Norm & Sharon
lenders.loan_because: To us this is a  fantastic way to help others to help themselves. As a former business owner we know what gratification you can get from having your own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a business owner who after 33 years decided to sell my business

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I first heard of this concept about 20 years ago..but there was no way that individuals could become involved in microcredit financing. This a brillant execution of a wonderful concept.
lenders.occupational_info: Simply put I help to raise funds for non-profits. I am retired from the investment business.

lenders.name: Earl
lenders.loan_because:
I admire people who persevere in lands where there is great hardship - especially the hardship of war.

I live in a land of peace and plenty so it is easy to share.

lenders.name: Leonor
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to pursue their dreams through hard work.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: I think this a great way to support  others but to do it in such a way that isn't charity and provides incentives to earn a living

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the lives of others
lenders.occupational_info: Personnel Secretary for a High School

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by my children. Two, Brendan and Tess, are with Engineers Without Borders, and Brendan has gone twice to Senegal with EWB.  All of my kids intend to make the world a better place, and this is my small way of contributing to that.

lenders.name: Mario
lenders.loan_because: I can and I care.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I hope that I can help make the world a slightly better place by helping people that are invested in their family's future.
lenders.occupational_info: Mortgage Technology

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research to help understand why some individuals suffer from mental disturbances.  With the findings of the research, new treatments can be developed.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: This is a incredible opportunity to be involved in a self sustainable way to directly help those that need it most and to pay it forward.

lenders.name: ALLENE
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a great way to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people reach their own decisions about a dispute and find Agreement

lenders.name: Ahsan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving and sharing. I love to assist the true needy ones, who are deprived of the good times.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Project Manager in California, USA.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.occupational_info: Investment Banking

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is a way I can have a direct positive impact on someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a highschool geography teacher.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an organization that provides supports and services to people with developmental disabilities. It's our mission to have all people from all walks of life living and working as one.

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired grandmother with a major responsibility of raising my 10 year old granddaughter.

lenders.name: Fatou
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in micro-loans more than "regular" aid programs.
I believe in empowering local population and development through entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Sushi Aficionado Group
lenders.loan_because: We like to support fish farmers and merchants around the world to replenish our fish/seafood consumption. Visit our website and you'll understand why we loan...

lenders.name: priscilla
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying International business with a hope to focus on combining micro-lending and fashion designers to distribute to boutiques all over the world.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I feel connected to others who are living close to nature and it just feels right
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to communicate to get their important needs met.  For some how to be more assertive, for others how to connect with themselves and others - it is work of the heart

lenders.name: Lala
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this microcredit thing. However, I am looking/waiting for someone who is actually doing a business for the greater good...something fresh...something visionary, not just making money for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy tour guiding, public relations, writing, acting, singing, creating, imagining, and helping people now and for the future.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: if everyone helped just a little, great changes can be made.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lenders.name: Maizies
lenders.loan_because: We like to make a difference in a lot of small ways to other women in Adelaide and around the world.

lenders.name: Shelley & Greg
lenders.loan_because: It seems fair to share some of our good fortune -- and Kiva's smart giving.
lenders.occupational_info: a magazine journalist and a fishing tackle guru

lenders.name: madlyscout
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: i like music :-)

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to able to loan money.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a computer programmer working on an electronic medical record application at a major hospital

lenders.name: Elsie
lenders.loan_because: I would like my children to know that they are incredibly lucky and privileged.  And for them to learn that they can take action and make a difference.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: This world needs our help...
lenders.occupational_info: I make clothing for people who are involved in the Drum & Bass Music culture...

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: We are all one.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I have this opportunity to do so :)

lenders.name: Zhongkai LI
lenders.loan_because: I know how largely our lives can be changed. I myself was born in a poor village in China. I wish all chichren and families will have bright futures.
lenders.occupational_info: I am struggling to complete my PhD.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important to help those that are willing to help themselves. Success breeds success.
lenders.occupational_info: Sales in the golf industry

lenders.name: Venetya
lenders.loan_because: I want to help families and communities to rise above poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software programs.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I have more than enough but there are so many who need so much. Tengo más que es suficiente pero hay tantas personas que necesitan tanto.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I beleive in supporting those that want to make a difference in their lives and have good ideas to put to practice for the good of the community and themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I assist companies across the globe to reach their goals and objectives

lenders.name: Lizzie
lenders.loan_because: If you have the money, why wouldn't you? You are giving people the chance to live the lives that we take for granted
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mental health nurse. It is equal parts frustrating, heartbreaking, hilarious, and fulfilling.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I believe that enabling independent businessmen and businesswomen to succeed is the most effective way to impact developing economies. I believe that individual help, not monies that get side-tracked by corrupt governments, will make the biggest difference to people and to the future.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the possibility and opportunity to get a better life! and this is a great way to do it!

lenders.name: mark
lenders.occupation: just someone who wants to help

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I like the consept of being able to help an identifyable single person or a group of people, who are struggling in reaching their defined goals.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for a computer software company in Norway, focusing on open source solutions (Linux, etc.).
I give away our own software for free, but at the same time offering services like support and training - but this is strictly optional.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: we are the lucky country....I wish our luck to others
lenders.occupational_info: I sell houses and farms

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
